French: La forêt est couverte de feuilles mortes.
English: The forest is covered in dead leaves.

French: Le lac est gelé depuis plusieurs jours.
English: The lake has been frozen for several days.

French: Les oiseaux migrent chaque année à cette période.
English: The birds migrate every year at this time.

French: La plupart des animaux hibernquent pendant l'hiver.
English: Most animals hibernate during the winter.

French: Le soleil se lève de plus en plus tôt chaque jour.
English: The sun rises earlier and earlier each day.
